title: Stevie B - Love & Emotion (2307-2-R)
description:
[i]Stevie B is a legend. An obscure legend. You can hear New Edition in his work. Without researching it's likely he molded many other groups into super stars. This CD only has 4 reviews at Amazon all by amateurs. What a shame.  He tried to usher 80's pop into the 90's and it was just not going to happen.  Hip hop took over.  Still, a good release and worthy of archive in your collection

Please seed this gem. Do it for Stevie B!!!

- Big Papi[/i]
